content: 1 Paul and Timothy, servants of Christ Jesus, to all the saints in Christ Jesus that are at Philippi, with the bishops and deacons:
content_old: 1 Paul and Timothy, servants of Christ Jesus, to all the saints in Christ Jesus that are at Philippi, with the bishops and deacons:

content: 2 Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
content_old: 2 Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

content: 3 I thank my God upon all my remembrance of you,
content_old: 3 I thank my God upon all my remembrance of you,

content: 4 always in every supplication of mine on behalf of you all making my supplication with joy,
content_old: 4 always in every supplication of mine on behalf of you all making my supplication with joy,

content: 5 for your fellowship in furtherance of the gospel from the first day until now;
content_old: 5 for your fellowship in furtherance of the gospel from the first day until now;

content: 6 being confident of this very thing, that he who began a good work in you will perfect it until the day of Jesus Christ:
content_old: 6 being confident of this very thing, that he who began a good work in you will perfect it until the day of Jesus Christ:

content: 7 even as it is right for me to be thus minded on behalf of you all, because I have you in my heart, inasmuch as, both in my bonds and in the defence and confirmation of the gospel, ye all are partakers with me of grace.
content_old: 7 even as it is right for me to be thus minded on behalf of you all, because I have you in my heart, inasmuch as, both in my bonds and in the defence and confirmation of the gospel, ye all are partakers with me of grace.

content: 8 For God is my witness, how I long after you all in the tender mercies of Christ Jesus.
content_old: 8 For God is my witness, how I long after you all in the tender mercies of Christ Jesus.

content: 9 And this I pray, that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and all discernment;
content_old: 9 And this I pray, that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and all discernment;

content: 10 so that ye may approve the things that are excellent; that ye may be sincere and void of offence unto the day of Christ;
content_old: 10 so that ye may approve the things that are excellent; that ye may be sincere and void of offence unto the day of Christ;

content: 11 being filled with the fruits of righteousness, which are through Jesus Christ, unto the glory and praise of God.
content_old: 11 being filled with the fruits of righteousness, which are through Jesus Christ, unto the glory and praise of God.

content: 12 Now I would have you know, brethren, that the things which happened unto me have fallen out rather unto the progress of the gospel;
content_old: 12 Now I would have you know, brethren, that the things which happened unto me have fallen out rather unto the progress of the gospel;

content: 13 so that my bonds became manifest in Christ throughout the whole praetorian guard, and to all the rest;
content_old: 13 so that my bonds became manifest in Christ throughout the whole praetorian guard, and to all the rest;

content: 14 and that most of the brethren in the Lord, being confident through my bonds, are more abundantly bold to speak the word of God without fear.
content_old: 14 and that most of the brethren in the Lord, being confident through my bonds, are more abundantly bold to speak the word of God without fear.

content: 15 Some indeed preach Christ even of envy and strife; and some also of good will:
content_old: 15 Some indeed preach Christ even of envy and strife; and some also of good will:

content: 16 the one do it of love, knowing that I am set for the defence of the gospel;
content_old: 16 the one do it of love, knowing that I am set for the defence of the gospel;

content: 17 but the other proclaim Christ of faction, not sincerely, thinking to raise up affliction for me in my bonds.
content_old: 17 but the other proclaim Christ of faction, not sincerely, thinking to raise up affliction for me in my bonds.

content: 18 What then? only that in every way, whether in pretence or in truth, Christ is proclaimed; and therein I rejoice, yea, and will rejoice.
content_old: 18 What then? only that in every way, whether in pretence or in truth, Christ is proclaimed; and therein I rejoice, yea, and will rejoice.

content: 19 For I know that this shall turn out to my salvation, through your supplication and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ,
content_old: 19 For I know that this shall turn out to my salvation, through your supplication and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ,

content: 20 according to my earnest expectation and hope, that in nothing shall I be put to shame, but that with all boldness, as always, so now also Christ shall be magnified in my body, whether by life, or by death.
content_old: 20 according to my earnest expectation and hope, that in nothing shall I be put to shame, but that with all boldness, as always, so now also Christ shall be magnified in my body, whether by life, or by death.

content: 21 For to me to live is Christ, and to die is gain.
content_old: 21 For to me to live is Christ, and to die is gain.

content: 22 But if to live in the flesh,—if this shall bring fruit from my work, then what I shall choose I know not.
content_old: 22 But if to live in the flesh,—if this shall bring fruit from my work, then what I shall choose I know not.

content: 23 But I am in a strait betwixt the two, having the desire to depart and be with Christ; for it is very far better:
content_old: 23 But I am in a strait betwixt the two, having the desire to depart and be with Christ; for it is very far better:

content: 24 yet to abide in the flesh is more needful for your sake.
content_old: 24 yet to abide in the flesh is more needful for your sake.

content: 25 And having this confidence, I know that I shall abide, yea, and abide with you all, for your progress and joy in the faith;
content_old: 25 And having this confidence, I know that I shall abide, yea, and abide with you all, for your progress and joy in the faith;

content: 26 that your glorying may abound in Christ Jesus in me through my presence with you again.
content_old: 26 that your glorying may abound in Christ Jesus in me through my presence with you again.

content: 27 Only let your manner of life be worthy of the gospel of Christ: that, whether I come and see you or be absent, I may hear of your state, that ye stand fast in one spirit, with one soul striving for the faith of the gospel;
content_old: 27 Only let your manner of life be worthy of the gospel of Christ: that, whether I come and see you or be absent, I may hear of your state, that ye stand fast in one spirit, with one soul striving for the faith of the gospel;

content: 28 and in nothing affrighted by the adversaries: which is for them an evident token of perdition, but of your salvation, and that from God;
content_old: 28 and in nothing affrighted by the adversaries: which is for them an evident token of perdition, but of your salvation, and that from God;

content: 29 because to you it hath been granted in the behalf of Christ, not only to believe on him, but also to suffer in his behalf:
content_old: 29 because to you it hath been granted in the behalf of Christ, not only to believe on him, but also to suffer in his behalf:

content: 1 If there is therefore any exhortation in Christ, if any consolation of love, if any fellowship of the Spirit, if any tender mercies and compassions,
content_old: 1 If there is therefore any exhortation in Christ, if any consolation of love, if any fellowship of the Spirit, if any tender mercies and compassions,

content: 2 make full my joy, that ye be of the same mind, having the same love, being of one accord, of one mind;
content_old: 2 make full my joy, that ye be of the same mind, having the same love, being of one accord, of one mind;

content: 3 doing nothing through faction or through vainglory, but in lowliness of mind each counting other better than himself;
content_old: 3 doing nothing through faction or through vainglory, but in lowliness of mind each counting other better than himself;

content: 4 not looking each of you to his own things, but each of you also to the things of others.
content_old: 4 not looking each of you to his own things, but each of you also to the things of others.

content: 5 Have this mind in you, which was also in Christ Jesus:
content_old: 5 Have this mind in you, which was also in Christ Jesus:

content: 6 who, existing in the form of God, counted not the being on an equality with God a thing to be grasped,
content_old: 6 who, existing in the form of God, counted not the being on an equality with God a thing to be grasped,

content: 7 but emptied himself, taking the form of a servant, being made in the likeness of men;
content_old: 7 but emptied himself, taking the form of a servant, being made in the likeness of men;

content: 8 and being found in fashion as a man, he humbled himself, becoming obedient even unto death, yea, the death of the cross.
content_old: 8 and being found in fashion as a man, he humbled himself, becoming obedient even unto death, yea, the death of the cross.

content: 9 Wherefore also God highly exalted him, and gave unto him the name which is above every name;
content_old: 9 Wherefore also God highly exalted him, and gave unto him the name which is above every name;

content: 10 that in the name of Jesus every knee should bow, of things in heaven and things on earth and things under the earth,
content_old: 10 that in the name of Jesus every knee should bow, of things in heaven and things on earth and things under the earth,

content: 11 and that every tongue should confess that Jesus Christ is Lord, to the glory of God the Father.
content_old: 11 and that every tongue should confess that Jesus Christ is Lord, to the glory of God the Father.

content: 12 So then, my beloved, even as ye have always obeyed, not as in my presence only, but now much more in my absence, work out your own salvation with fear and trembling;
content_old: 12 So then, my beloved, even as ye have always obeyed, not as in my presence only, but now much more in my absence, work out your own salvation with fear and trembling;

content: 13 for it is God who worketh in you both to will and to work, for his good pleasure.
content_old: 13 for it is God who worketh in you both to will and to work, for his good pleasure.

content: 14 Do all things without murmurings and questionings:
content_old: 14 Do all things without murmurings and questionings:

content: 15 that ye may become blameless and harmless, children of God without blemish in the midst of a crooked and perverse generation, among whom ye are seen as lights in the world,
content_old: 15 that ye may become blameless and harmless, children of God without blemish in the midst of a crooked and perverse generation, among whom ye are seen as lights in the world,

content: 16 holding forth the word of life; that I may have whereof to glory in the day of Christ, that I did not run in vain neither labor in vain.
content_old: 16 holding forth the word of life; that I may have whereof to glory in the day of Christ, that I did not run in vain neither labor in vain.

content: 17 Yea, and if I am offered upon the sacrifice and service of your faith, I joy, and rejoice with you all:
content_old: 17 Yea, and if I am offered upon the sacrifice and service of your faith, I joy, and rejoice with you all:

content: 18 and in the same manner do ye also joy, and rejoice with me.
content_old: 18 and in the same manner do ye also joy, and rejoice with me.

content: 19 But I hope in the Lord Jesus to send Timothy shortly unto you, that I also may be of good comfort, when I know your state.
content_old: 19 But I hope in the Lord Jesus to send Timothy shortly unto you, that I also may be of good comfort, when I know your state.

content: 20 For I have no man likeminded, who will care truly for your state.
content_old: 20 For I have no man likeminded, who will care truly for your state.

content: 21 For they all seek their own, not the things of Jesus Christ.
content_old: 21 For they all seek their own, not the things of Jesus Christ.

content: 22 But ye know the proof of him, that, as a child serveth a father, so he served with me in furtherance of the gospel.
content_old: 22 But ye know the proof of him, that, as a child serveth a father, so he served with me in furtherance of the gospel.

content: 23 Him therefore I hope to send forthwith, so soon as I shall see how it will go with me:
content_old: 23 Him therefore I hope to send forthwith, so soon as I shall see how it will go with me:

content: 24 but I trust in the Lord that I myself also shall come shortly.
content_old: 24 but I trust in the Lord that I myself also shall come shortly.

content: 25 But I counted it necessary to send to you Epaphroditus, my brother and fellow-worker and fellow-soldier, and your messenger and minister to my need;
content_old: 25 But I counted it necessary to send to you Epaphroditus, my brother and fellow-worker and fellow-soldier, and your messenger and minister to my need;

content: 26 since he longed after you all, and was sore troubled, because ye had heard that he was sick:
content_old: 26 since he longed after you all, and was sore troubled, because ye had heard that he was sick:

content: 27 for indeed he was sick nigh unto death: but God had mercy on him; and not on him only, but on me also, that I might not have sorrow upon sorrow.
content_old: 27 for indeed he was sick nigh unto death: but God had mercy on him; and not on him only, but on me also, that I might not have sorrow upon sorrow.

content: 28 I have sent him therefore the more diligently, that, when ye see him again, ye may rejoice, and that I may be the less sorrowful.
content_old: 28 I have sent him therefore the more diligently, that, when ye see him again, ye may rejoice, and that I may be the less sorrowful.

content: 29 Receive him therefore in the Lord with all joy; and hold such in honor:
content_old: 29 Receive him therefore in the Lord with all joy; and hold such in honor:

content: 1 Finally, my brethren, rejoice in the Lord. To write the same things to you, to me indeed is not irksome, but for you it is safe.
content_old: 1 Finally, my brethren, rejoice in the Lord. To write the same things to you, to me indeed is not irksome, but for you it is safe.

content: 2 Beware of the dogs, beware of the evil workers, beware of the concision:
content_old: 2 Beware of the dogs, beware of the evil workers, beware of the concision:

content: 3 for we are the circumcision, who worship by the Spirit of God, and glory in Christ Jesus, and have no confidence in the flesh:
content_old: 3 for we are the circumcision, who worship by the Spirit of God, and glory in Christ Jesus, and have no confidence in the flesh:

content: 4 though I myself might have confidence even in the flesh: if any other man thinketh to have confidence in the flesh, I yet more:
content_old: 4 though I myself might have confidence even in the flesh: if any other man thinketh to have confidence in the flesh, I yet more:

content: 5 circumcised the eighth day, of the stock of Israel, of the tribe of Benjamin, a Hebrew of Hebrews; as touching the law, a Pharisee;
content_old: 5 circumcised the eighth day, of the stock of Israel, of the tribe of Benjamin, a Hebrew of Hebrews; as touching the law, a Pharisee;

content: 6 as touching zeal, persecuting the church; as touching the righteousness which is in the law, found blameless.
content_old: 6 as touching zeal, persecuting the church; as touching the righteousness which is in the law, found blameless.

content: 7 Howbeit what things were gain to me, these have I counted loss for Christ.
content_old: 7 Howbeit what things were gain to me, these have I counted loss for Christ.

content: 8 Yea verily, and I count all things to be loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord: for whom I suffered the loss of all things, and do count them but refuse, that I may gain Christ,
content_old: 8 Yea verily, and I count all things to be loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord: for whom I suffered the loss of all things, and do count them but refuse, that I may gain Christ,

content: 9 and be found in him, not having a righteousness of mine own, even that which is of the law, but that which is through faith in Christ, the righteousness which is from God by faith:
content_old: 9 and be found in him, not having a righteousness of mine own, even that which is of the law, but that which is through faith in Christ, the righteousness which is from God by faith:

content: 10 that I may know him, and the power of his resurrection, and the fellowship of his sufferings, becoming conformed unto his death;
content_old: 10 that I may know him, and the power of his resurrection, and the fellowship of his sufferings, becoming conformed unto his death;

content: 11 if by any means I may attain unto the resurrection from the dead.
content_old: 11 if by any means I may attain unto the resurrection from the dead.

content: 12 Not that I have already obtained, or am already made perfect: but I press on, if so be that I may lay hold on that for which also I was laid hold on by Christ Jesus.
content_old: 12 Not that I have already obtained, or am already made perfect: but I press on, if so be that I may lay hold on that for which also I was laid hold on by Christ Jesus.

content: 13 Brethren, I count not myself yet to have laid hold: but one thing I do, forgetting the things which are behind, and stretching forward to the things which are before.
content_old: 13 Brethren, I count not myself yet to have laid hold: but one thing I do, forgetting the things which are behind, and stretching forward to the things which are before.

content: 14 I press on toward the goal unto the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus.
content_old: 14 I press on toward the goal unto the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus.

content: 15 Let us therefore, as many as are perfect, be thus minded: and if in anything ye are otherwise minded, this also shall God reveal unto you:
content_old: 15 Let us therefore, as many as are perfect, be thus minded: and if in anything ye are otherwise minded, this also shall God reveal unto you:

content: 16 only, whereunto we have attained, by that same rule let us walk.
content_old: 16 only, whereunto we have attained, by that same rule let us walk.

content: 17 Brethren, be ye imitators together of me, and mark them that so walk even as ye have us for an ensample.
content_old: 17 Brethren, be ye imitators together of me, and mark them that so walk even as ye have us for an ensample.

content: 18 For many walk, of whom I told you often, and now tell you even weeping, that they are the enemies of the cross of Christ:
content_old: 18 For many walk, of whom I told you often, and now tell you even weeping, that they are the enemies of the cross of Christ:

content: 19 whose end is perdition, whose god is the belly, and whose glory is in their shame, who mind earthly things.
content_old: 19 whose end is perdition, whose god is the belly, and whose glory is in their shame, who mind earthly things.

content: 20 For our citizenship is in heaven; whence also we wait for a Saviour, the Lord Jesus Christ:
content_old: 20 For our citizenship is in heaven; whence also we wait for a Saviour, the Lord Jesus Christ:

content: 1 Wherefore, my brethren beloved and longed for, my joy and crown, so stand fast in the Lord, my beloved.
content_old: 1 Wherefore, my brethren beloved and longed for, my joy and crown, so stand fast in the Lord, my beloved.

content: 2 I exhort Euodia, and I exhort Syntyche, to be of the same mind in the Lord.
content_old: 2 I exhort Euodia, and I exhort Syntyche, to be of the same mind in the Lord.

content: 3 Yea, I beseech thee also, true yokefellow, help these women, for they labored with me in the gospel, with Clement also, and the rest of my fellow-workers, whose names are in the book of life.
content_old: 3 Yea, I beseech thee also, true yokefellow, help these women, for they labored with me in the gospel, with Clement also, and the rest of my fellow-workers, whose names are in the book of life.

content: 4 Rejoice in the Lord always: again I will say, Rejoice.
content_old: 4 Rejoice in the Lord always: again I will say, Rejoice.

content: 5 Let your forbearance be known unto all men. The Lord is at hand.
content_old: 5 Let your forbearance be known unto all men. The Lord is at hand.

content: 6 In nothing be anxious; but in everything by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God.
content_old: 6 In nothing be anxious; but in everything by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God.

content: 7 And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall guard your hearts and your thoughts in Christ Jesus.
content_old: 7 And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall guard your hearts and your thoughts in Christ Jesus.

content: 8 Finally, brethren, whatsoever things are true, whatsoever things are honorable, whatsoever things are just, whatsoever things are pure, whatsoever things are lovely, whatsoever things are of good report; if there be any virtue, and if there be any praise, think on these things.
content_old: 8 Finally, brethren, whatsoever things are true, whatsoever things are honorable, whatsoever things are just, whatsoever things are pure, whatsoever things are lovely, whatsoever things are of good report; if there be any virtue, and if there be any praise, think on these things.

content: 9 The things which ye both learned and received and heard and saw in me, these things do: and the God of peace shall be with you.
content_old: 9 The things which ye both learned and received and heard and saw in me, these things do: and the God of peace shall be with you.

content: 10 But I rejoice in the Lord greatly, that now at length ye have revived your thought for me; wherein ye did indeed take thought, but ye lacked opportunity.
content_old: 10 But I rejoice in the Lord greatly, that now at length ye have revived your thought for me; wherein ye did indeed take thought, but ye lacked opportunity.

content: 11 Not that I speak in respect of want: for I have learned, in whatsoever state I am, therein to be content.
content_old: 11 Not that I speak in respect of want: for I have learned, in whatsoever state I am, therein to be content.

content: 12 I know how to be abased, and I know also how to abound: in everything and in all things have I learned the secret both to be filled and to be hungry, both to abound and to be in want.
content_old: 12 I know how to be abased, and I know also how to abound: in everything and in all things have I learned the secret both to be filled and to be hungry, both to abound and to be in want.

content: 13 I can do all things in him that strengtheneth me.
content_old: 13 I can do all things in him that strengtheneth me.

content: 14 Howbeit ye did well that ye had fellowship with my affliction.
content_old: 14 Howbeit ye did well that ye had fellowship with my affliction.

content: 15 And ye yourselves also know, ye Philippians, that in the beginning of the gospel, when I departed from Macedonia, no church had fellowship with me in the matter of giving and receiving but ye only;
content_old: 15 And ye yourselves also know, ye Philippians, that in the beginning of the gospel, when I departed from Macedonia, no church had fellowship with me in the matter of giving and receiving but ye only;

content: 16 for even in Thessalonica ye sent once and again unto my need.
content_old: 16 for even in Thessalonica ye sent once and again unto my need.

content: 17 Not that I seek for the gift; but I seek for the fruit that increaseth to your account.
content_old: 17 Not that I seek for the gift; but I seek for the fruit that increaseth to your account.

content: 18 But I have all things, and abound: I am filled, having received from Epaphroditus the things that came from you, an odor of a sweet smell, a sacrifice acceptable, well-pleasing to God.
content_old: 18 But I have all things, and abound: I am filled, having received from Epaphroditus the things that came from you, an odor of a sweet smell, a sacrifice acceptable, well-pleasing to God.

content: 19 And my God shall supply every need of yours according to his riches in glory in Christ Jesus.
content_old: 19 And my God shall supply every need of yours according to his riches in glory in Christ Jesus.

content: 20 Now unto our God and Father be the glory for ever and ever. Amen.
content_old: 20 Now unto our God and Father be the glory for ever and ever. Amen.

content: 21 Salute every saint in Christ Jesus. The brethren that are with me salute you.
content_old: 21 Salute every saint in Christ Jesus. The brethren that are with me salute you.

content: 22 All the saints salute you, especially they that are of Caesar’s household.
content_old: 22 All the saints salute you, especially they that are of Caesar’s household.
